p: Although LAMP is a powerful method for the screening of samples and rapid responses, it may not be suitable when many validation parameters need to be estimated, as in the case of intra- or inter-lab comparisons (Panno et al. 2020). Moreover, the LAMP reaction is more prone to cross-contamination than other amplification techniques (Karami et al. 2011; Karthik et al. 2014).
